description.title: Celebrate Your Story Above the Clouds
description.paragraph: Some moments deserve more than a dinner reservation. Float above the ancient pyramids of TeotihuacÃ¡n at sunrise with the person who means everything. A private basket, a sparkling toast at 2,000 meters, and a view that no restaurant can match. Flying Pictures turns your anniversary into a story you'll tell for the rest of your lives.

steps.title: 5:00 AM - Arrive & Check-in
steps.description: You'll arrive at Flying Pictures Reception and we will receive you to help you check-in and loremipsum.

steps.title: Welcome & Coffee Break
steps.description: After you complete your check-in we will welcome you with our coffee station with hot beverages and traditional cookies.

steps.title: The Inflation Spectacle
steps.description: Walk to the launch field to watch the "Giants" come to life. Seeing the massive balloons rise with the roar of the burners is the first act of the show.

steps.title: The Ascent
steps.description: Lift off gently into the dawn. For approx. 45-60 minutes, float silently over the Valley of TeotihuacÃ¡n, watching the sun reveal the pyramids from above.

steps.title: The 1783 Toast
steps.description: Upon landing, we celebrate with a traditional sparkling wine toast. A ritual dating back to the first aviators to thank the wind gods for a safe return.
